body:
## Projects ##
* [Jasny Bootstrap](http://jasny.github.com/bootstrap) - Extension on the Twitter Bootstrap CSS/JS framework
* [DB-MySQL](http://jasny.github.com/DB-MySQL) - A simple MySQL DB layer
* [DBQuery-MySQL](http://jasny.github.com/DBQuery-MySQL) - The best and most complete query builder/parser for MySQL
* [UDF Repository for MySQL](http://www.mysqludf.org) - MySQL UDFs offer a powerful way to extend the functionality of your MySQL database.

## Other sites ##
* [jasny.net](http://www.jasny.net) - Articles about MySQL, PHP & JavaScript
* [LinkedIn](nl.linkedin.com/in/arnolddaniels)
* [@ArnoldDaniels](http://www.twitter.com/ArnoldDaniels) on Twitter

## About me ##
Hi, I'm Arnold Daniels. I've spend a big part of my life behind a computer (and not playing games). I've learned a lot about databases, programming and system administration especially on. the LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL & PHP).

![Arnold Daniels](http://www.jasny.net/wp-content/uploads/arnold_new.jpg)
name: Jasny
